Plot
A string of family murders takes place and Will
determines they were conducted by each of the families
missing children, who were abducted and brainwashed
into killing their old families for their sinister "new family."
Against Alana’s recommendation, Hannibal checks Abigail out of the
hospital for some frightening psychiatric practices that ultimately
align her loyalty with him
